faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: The course introduces basic natural language processing tasks such as language modeling, text classification, and sequence models. Tasks are formulated in deep-learning terms, using recurrent and attention-based neural networks. In addition, other topics relevant to natural language processing are discussed: text preprocessing, various text representation methods, methods for evaluating systems results etc.
description.et: Kursuses tutvustatakse põhilisi loomuliku keele töötluse ülesandeid: keelemudelid, teksti klassifitseerija ja jadamudelid. Ülesandeid formuleeritakse süvaõppe terminites, tutvustades rekurrentseid ja tähelepanupõhiseid närvivõrke. Lisaks käsitletakse muid loomuliku keele töötluses olulisi teemasid: teksti eeltöötlus, erinevad tekstide representeerimise viisid, tulemuste hindamine jne.

objectives.en: The goal of this subject is to teach students the contemporary natural language processing tasks and methods; to show how to formulate various NLP related problems as appropriate text mining or machine learning tasks; to practice implementing solutions to these tasks using appropriate tools and techniques.
objectives.et: Aine eesmärk on tutvustada üliõpilastele kaasaegseid loomuliku keele töötluse ülesandeid ja meetodeid; õpetada formuleerima loomuliku keele töötlusega seotud probleeme sobivate masinõppe või tekstikaeve ülesannetena; õpetada implementeerima nende ülesannete lahendusi sobivate tehnikate abil.

learning_outcomes.en: After passing the course the student
- Knows the main natural language processing tasks.
learning_outcomes.et: - Teab põhilisi loomuliku keele töötluse ülesandeid.

learning_outcomes.en: - Knows the main methods for solving various natural language processing tasks.
learning_outcomes.et: - Tunneb põhilisi meetodeid loomuliku keele töötluse ülesannete lahendamiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: - Can choose suitable methods for solving various natural language processing tasks.
learning_outcomes.et: - Oskab valida sobivat meetodit erinevate loomuliku keele töötluse ülesannete lahendamiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: - Can choose and use suitable software libraries for solving various natural language processing problems.
learning_outcomes.et: - Oskab valida ja kasutada laialtlevinumaid tarkvaralisi teeke ja vahendeid erinevate loomuliku keele töötluse ülesannete lahendamiseks.

independent_work.et:
1) 3  practical homeworks, instructions in courses and moodle, submission in moodle
2) A project done individually or in groups, instructions in courses and moodle, submission in moodle
3) A seminar presentation based on given materials, done in groups
4) Written test in classroom, with pen and paper, closed books.
5) Practicum exercises submitted on time, instructions in courses and moodle, submission in moodle.

description.et: Seminar presentation based on given materials, max 5 points
3 practical homeworks, max 35 points in total
10 practicum exercises, max 10 points in total.

grade_evaluation.et: Practical homeworks (max 35) + Theory test (max 20) + Project (max 35) + Seminar presentation (max 5) + Practicum submissions (max 10) = max 105

debt_elimination.et: Upon the agreement with the lecturer.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

audience.et: Masters and doctoral students interested in natural language processing.
